keyMoments.title: CP9 Chief Accidentally Triggers Buster Call
keyMoments.description: Spandam, the chief of CP9, accidentally activates the Buster Call while attempting to contact his agents, condemning Enies Lobby to destruction.
keyMoments.significance: This catastrophic mistake by the CP9 chief creates a crisis that affects all CP9 members and their mission, forcing them to continue their battles while knowing the island will be destroyed.

description: CP9 is a secret World Government intelligence agency specializing in assassination and espionage. All members are masters of the Rokushiki martial arts.

keyMoments.title: Captain Begins Climactic Battle
keyMoments.description: Luffy confronts Rob Lucci in the Tower of Justice, beginning the decisive battle to save Robin.
keyMoments.significance: The captain's fight against CP9's strongest member determines whether the crew can save Robin and escape before the Buster Call arrives.

keyMoments.title: Chopper's Uncontrollable Rampage
keyMoments.description: Chopper's Monster Point transformation continues to rampage out of control, attacking crew allies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the dangerous state of the crew's doctor and the desperate measures being taken to rescue Robin.

description: Pirate crew led by Monkey D. Luffy, currently fighting to rescue their crewmate Nico Robin from the World Government at Enies Lobby.
